name: #121 Blue Skies - PDF Pattern
description:
Materials Needed (57.5 x 68” quilt):

*12 fat quarters
*3 yards neutral background fabric
*1/2 yard accent fabric
*2/3 yard binding fabric
*4 yards back fabric
*62 x 72” cotton batting

Materials Needed (74.5 x 83.5” quilt):

*20 fat quarters
*4 yards neutral fabric
*3/4 yard accent fabric
*3/4 yard binding fabric
*5-1/3 yard back fabric
*79 x 84” cotton batting

name: #120 Dizzy Spell - PDF Pattern
description:
MATERIALS NEEDED

For small 52 x 64" quilt:

• 1 jelly roll (40 strips 2.5” x WOF) OR
• 1 layer cake (40 10 x 10” squares) OR
• 8 fat quarters
PLUS
• 1-1/4 yd neutral fabric
• 1/2 yd border fabric
• 12 yd binding fabric
• 56 x 68” cotton batting
• 3-1/2 yd back fabric

For large 76 x 88" quilt:

• 2 jelly rolls (80 strips 2.5” x WOF) OR
• 2 layer cakes (80 10 x 10” squares) OR
• 16 fat quarters
PLUS
• 2 fat eighths
• 2-1/4 yd neutral fabric
• 3/4 yd border fabric
• 3/4 yd binding fabric
• 80 x 92” cotton batting
• 5-1/2 yd back fabric

Cover fabrics are "Ruby" by Bonnie & Camille for Moda.

This is the PDF version of the pattern and is e-mailed immediately.

name: #119 Heartthrob - PDF Pattern
description:
77 x 85.5" quilt
23.5 x 20.5" block

MATERIALS NEEDED:

*17 fat quarters OR
*1 jelly roll and 9 fat quarters OR
*Scraps (Nine 12 x 20.5" blocks and ninety 2.5 x 12" strips)
PLUS 
*4 yards neutral fabric 
*3/4 yard red border fabric 
*2/3 yard binding fabric 
*6 yards back fabric 
*81 x 90" batting

BONUS QUILT (47 x 47"):

*16 leftover HSTs from Heartthrob
*1/3 yard neutral fabric
*1/2 yard red border fabric
*1/2 yard binding fabric
*3 yards back fabric
*51 x 51" cotton batting

Fabric used is Happy-Go-Lucky by Bonnie & Camille for Moda, and Yarn-Dyed Flax in Linen by Robert Kaufman (for the neutral).

This is the PDF version of the pattern and will be e-mailed instantly.

name: #117 Snow Blossoms - PDF Pattern
description:
Vanessa's "Snow Blossoms" quilt is a celebration of the Nordic snowflake seen in so many lovely wintry textiles. This quilt pattern makes a great block-of-the-month project!

Finished quilt size is 83-1/2 x 83-1/2".

MATERIALS NEEDED:

*18 fat quarters
*4-1/2 yards neutral fabric
*1-1/4 yard border fabric
*5 yards back fabric
*3/4 yard binding fabric
*88 x 88" batting

Fabric used is Vintage Modern by Bonnie & Camille for Moda. 

This is the PDF version of the pattern and is e-mailed immediately.

name: #116 Lickety-Split - PDF Pattern
description:
A sweet and simple 4-to-9 patch quilt made using a layer cake or fat quarters. Finished quilt size is 73 x 73"

Materials Needed:

* 1 layer cake (42 10 x 10" squares) or 14 fat quarters
*3 yards neutral fabric
*1 yard border fabric
*4-1/2 yards back fabric
*3/4 yard binding fabric
*76 x 76" batting

Fabrics are "Marmalade" by Bonnie & Camille for Moda. This is a PDF version of the pattern and will be e-mailed immediately to the recipient.

name: #115 Sugar Rush - PDF Pattern
description:
Satisfy your quilting sweet tooth by sewing up this delicious quilt using my pattern!

Materials Needed:

*1 layer cake or 36 10" squares
*1-3/4 yards neutral fabric
*2-1/4 yards red fabric
*4-1/4 yards back fabric
*70 x 70" batting

Fabrics used are "Oh Deer" by Momo for Moda. This is the PDF version of the pattern and will be e-mailed immediately to the recipient.

name: #114 Twinkle Toes - PDF Pattern
description:
Deck the halls with these stylish elf-inspired stockings!  Finished stockings measure approximately 18" tall and 6" wide and feature an elf-toe and cuff embellished with ric rac or ball fringe trim.

Materials Needed Per Stocking:

*1/2 yard stocking fabric
*1 fat quarter cuff fabric
*1/2 yard lining fabric
*1/2 yard ric rac or ball fringe trim
*Poly-Fil fiberfill stuffing
*1 yard HeatnBond Non-Woven Feather Weight Interfacing (20" wide)

Fabrics pictured are Moda's "Vintage Modern" and "Ruby" by Bonnie & Camille.  This is the PDF version and will be e-mailed immediately.

name: #114 Twinkle Toes - PAPER Pattern
description:

This pattern is designed for beginners.  Finished stocking measures approximately 18" tall and 6" wide and feature an elf-toe and cuff embellished with ric rac or ball fringe trim.

Materials Needed Per Stocking:

*1/2 yard stocking fabric
*1 fat quarter cuff fabric
*1/2 yard lining fabric

*Poly-Fil fiberfill stuffing
*1 yard HeatnBond Non-Woven Feather Weight Interfacing (20" wide)

Fabrics used are "Vintage Modern" and "Ruby" by Bonnie & Camille for Moda.  This is the paper version of the pattern and will be mailed within 1 business day via USPS.

name: #113 Spare Change - PDF Pattern
description:
A modern twist on a traditional coin quilt!

This pattern is designed for beginners and is a great way to use fat quarters or charm packs.  Finished quilt size is 54 x 56"

Materials Needed:

* 6 fat quarters or 2 charm packs
* 2 yd neutral fabric
* 1/2 yd binding fabric
* 3-1/2 yd back fabric

This listing is for the PDF version and will be e-mailed immediately to the e-mail address provided.

name: #112 Beep! Beep! - PDF Pattern
description:
Finally, a modern quilt for the little guy!

This pattern uses beginner-level applique skills and includes detailed instructions, diagrams, and all of the car and traffic signal templates. Finished quilt size is 57 x 57".

Materials Needed:

*3-1/4 yards neutral fabric
*1 pkg (17" x 5.25 yards) HeatnBond Lite
*1/2 yard brown fabric
*1/2 yard gray fabric
*1/2 yard green fabric
*1/2 yard blue fabric
*1/2 yard orange fabric
*1/2 yard binding fabric
*Thread to match
*3-1/2 yards back fabric
*60 x 60" cotton batting

Fabrics shown are Quilter's Linen in Stone by Robert Kaufman, Kona Cotton in Brown, Kona Cotton in Grass Green, Kona Cotton in Tangerine, and Mermaid Cotton Couture by Michael Miller.

name: #111 Pat-a-Cake - PDF pattern
description:
This beginner-level pattern is for a sweet toddler apron, oven mitt, and hot pad set for your wee baker! The apron is designed with extra-long ties to wrap completely around the waist to the front and tied in a decorative bow. (Instructions also available to make it tie in the back.) 

Materials Needed:

-1/2 yard dainty multifloral print
-1/2 yard pink floral print
-1/2 yard aqua print
-Fat quarter green print

Fabric is "Ruby" by Bonnie & Camille for Moda.

Recommended age for the finished product is 2-6 years. 
*WARNING* Not intended for actual oven usage.

PDF patterns are e-mailed immediately.

name: #106 Silly Goose - PDF pattern
description:
This beginner-level pattern includes detailed instructions and diagrams for the "Silly Goose" quilt design. Includes instructions for both 37 x 45" and 66 x 70" quilt sizes.

Materials Needed: (37 x 45")

-1 charm pack or five fat quarters
-1 1/4 yard neutral fabric
-1/2 yard binding fabric
-1 3/4 yard back fabric
-40 x 50" piece of batting (80/20 blend)

Materials Needed: (66 x 70")

-3 charm packs or ten fat quarters
-3 yards neutral fabric
-3/4 yard binding fabric
-4 yards back fabric
-70 x 74" piece of batting (80/20 blend)

Fabrics shown are "Ruby" by Bonnie & Camille for Moda Fabrics.

PDF patterns are e-mailed immediately.

name: #104 Zigzag Frenzy - PDF Pattern
description:
This scrappy chevron pattern is beginner-level and includes detailed instructions and diagrams to make this quilt in two sizes: one for baby (37 x 45") or one for you (66 x 70").

Materials Needed for 37 x 45" quilt:

*5 fat quarters 
*1/2 yd red fabric 
*1/2 yd white fabric 
*1 fat quarter black fabric
*1/2 yd border fabric
*1/2 yd binding fabric
*1-3/4 yd back fabric
*42 x 50" cotton batting

Materials Needed for 66 x 70" quilt:

*10 fat quarters
*1 yd red fabric
*1 yd white fabric
*2/3 yd black fabric
*3/4 yd border fabric
*3/4 yd binding fabric
*4 yd back fabric
*70 x 74" cotton batting

Fabric is "Next Wave" by Studio 37 for Marcus Fabrics.

PDF patterns are e-mailed immediately.
